actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that inmates of county homes and similar institutions for the elderly who are contributing to their own support and maintenance may qualify for supplemental security income benefits.

summary.text: Provides, under title XVI of the Social Security Act, that inmates of county homes and similar institutions for the elderly who are contributing to their own support and maintenance may qualify for supplemental security income benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide that inmates of county homes and similar institutions for the elderly who are contributing to their own support and maintenance may qualify for supplemental security income benefits.
